description:
The most complete open wheel racing experience. 
- 16 real tracks from all over the world
- Dynamic weather
- Pit stops
- Safety car
- 10 different teams
- Livery editor: design your own racing car!
- Helmet editor: design your own helmets!
- Online multiplayer
- ...and everything you can desire from a racing game!
name: Ala Mobile - Formula Racing
intro: It's time to prove you are fast!
